details.description: Complain about an approved driving instructor (ADI) if you're not happy with their service or behaviour
details.body:
Complain about an approved driving instructor (ADI) if youâ€™re not happy with their service or behaviour.

If your instructor isn’t providing a good service, contact your local Trading Standards office or Citizens Advice Bureau.

If you’re not happy with your instructor’s behaviour, contact the Driving Standards Agency (DSA).

DSA

adireg@dsa.gsi.gov.uk

ADI Section
DSA
The Axis Building
112 Upper Parliament Street
Nottingham
NG1 6LP

tags.title: Driving tests, motorcycle tests and learning to drive

details.description: Booking a test, changing and cancelling tests, rules and fees, compulsory basic training

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
